name: Olive Press - Image Compression
description:
Olive Press is an image compression and exporting tool for Figma. It allows you to export already compressed images directly from Figma. Olive Press supports the compression, conversion, and export of JPG, PNG, WEBP, and SVG images.


Usage

  1. Open Olive Press - Image Compression
  2. Select the layer(s) you'd like to export
  3. Select the desired image format from the dropdown
  4. Click the + icon to add the layers
  5. Adjust the file name, suffix, and scale
  6. Click Compress
  7. Download the compressed files


Support

For support, please email support@olivepress.app.
